Articles.Content:
The NaNo virus is no match for my...

![logo.gif](http://www.nanoav.ru/templates/new_nanoav/img/logo.gif)

My Antivirus Software

I enroll in NaNoWriMo, thus completing the triad of NaN.

somehow, this results in hills. probably. one of them is mine, but I'm not saying which.

"Black Hole Cluster, fire!"

Shu Shirakawa's hills. And Granzon.

![logo.gif](http://www.nanoav.ru/templates/new_nanoav/img/logo.gif)

My non-NaNoVirus hills.

![installing-update_sf.jpg](http://blog.laptopmag.com/wpress/wp-content/uploads/2011/05/installing-update_sf.jpg)

The update breaks the anti-virus.

My NaH.

(Not-A-Hill)

![logo.gif](http://www.nanoav.ru/templates/new_nanoav/img/logo.gif)

gets updated. My non-NaN hills.

I repeat.

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/r3HcfmPAxCY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Whatever there is (other than the Granzon), it now belongs to Shu once more.

Black hole prevention cream.

My (still) non-NaN hills.

You DO realise you're facing a Super-type giant robot, right?

The Black Hole Clusters continue.Shu's EVERYTHING.

Black hole prevention cream.

My non-NaN everything.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LNK5-uE5JFg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
 ITB4  

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/videoseries?list=PLmHOoyl3LhI6DCP0L8jqp34UPreDaITB4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
  
listen to the playlist. all your base is too busy listening to it, so now all your base are belong to me.
Except I didn't listen to it, so all my base are belong to me.

IT IS THE 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ZpBngmCpUrU?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

BAAAAANNNNNEEEEEEBLLLLAAAAADDDEEEEEE

my hill, and baneblade

I cast out [Palisade Giant](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=253567), and cast [Indestructibility](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=370673) on it. My ally casts [Alpha Authority](http://gatherer.wizards.com/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=366325) on it as well. Needless to say good luck.

I'll go for a stalemate, then.

Fairlion S, deploy!

Good luck hitting it, the pilot is incredibly skilled.

I defeat your robot with the only thing stronger than mecha

![chibi_gumiho_by_moe_love_chu-d3hkysh.png](http://fc02.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2011/150/b/d/chibi_gumiho_by_moe_love_chu-d3hkysh.png)

MOE

Surrender to the power of Cuteness.

My super cute girl in white

PYSKERS! USE THE CONJURATION POWER THING TO CALL OVER THOSE OTHER BAAAANNNNNEEEEEEEEEEBLLLAAAAAAAAAAAADDDDDDDDDEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEES

my hill, and also my wherever those baneblades where

Fel, that actually WOULDN'T work against the Fairlion S.

Since the robot is itself a dancing lolibot.

Not joking.

As such, Vostok Lasers rain down from on high.

Lat's hill.
I don't know about you guys, but I'm still standing over here.

It's because you have a size of SS, making you a lot harder to hit.

I'm not even trying to claim the hill, just letting the pilots of giant robots claim it themselves.

(Still Lat's hill, for the record)
I add Long to Lat. My GPS hill.

Except Lat is the (partial) name of a character. You can't perform the joke as a result.

The hill still belongs to [Lat](http://superrobotwars.wikia.com/wiki/Latune_Subbota), but this time I provide a link so you can learn her full name. (There's two different translations for it, you see)

EMP

that might cause here some problems my hill

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-01T15:36:09Z" title="06/01/2015 03:36  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 1, 2015</time> by Ethanadams**
I DDOS Youtube. My crashed servers and hill.

I just step out, and launch the argos 2.

now with super improved sheilds!

my ship.
